attributes.action: Stop the pension age to leave at 66 years old
attributes.additional_details: People are getting older and majority of people have worked since they were 14 / 15 years old. It’s unfair as the younger generation want jobs. Let the older generation who have worked hard  reap the benefits that they have put into there pension pots.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Freeze the state pension age at 66 years of age
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652042
